subclassFeature.name: Way of The Ninja
entries: Monks of the Way of The Ninja study and idolize draconic beings. They fight like Ninjas.

subclassFeature.name: Ninja Tools
entries: You learn to make ninja tools to assist your martial arts, once per short rest you can make up to 3 ninja tools, you may save them for later.

entries.caption: Ninja Tools
rows: Small sharp objects that litter the floor, causing pain and disability to those traversing them. Choose a 10 ft area within 15 ft. The chosen terrain is difficult terrain and any creature moving into and starting their turn in the caltrops takes {@dice d4} piercing damge.
Creats a 20ft circle of smoke that persists for one round, it is non magical and causes the dark condition.

subclassFeature.name: Ninja Style
entries: At 3rd level, you weave Ninja motions into your martial arts. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you use Step of the Wind, you may use a Ninja tool.
When you use Patient Defense, the first time you are hit you may swap places with an object within 30 ft of you.
When you use Flurry of Blows, you may kick off the target and go up to 10 ft away from it.
As a reaction to taking damage you may use a Ninja tool.

subclassFeature.name: Ninja Tools
entries: You learn to make ninja tools to assist your martial arts, once per short rest you can now make up to 4 ninja tools, you may save them for later.

entries.caption: Ninja Tools
rows: Small sharp objects that are thrown, the target takes {@dice d4} piercing damage, target must make a DC 12 Con save or begin bleeding.
Small weights connected on each end of a chain, can be used to restrain a creature as a reaction, canceling their attack.

when you move from one space to another up to 30ft, you may place a trip wire along the path you traveled. the first creature that walks through this area has to make a DC 14 dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone

subclassFeature.name: Honed Stealth
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to create a decoy of yourself and blink a short distance. Creatures must make a DC 16 + Dex perception check to know where you went.

subclassFeature.name: Masterful Reaction
entries: By 17th level you have taken upon the aspect of a true Ninja. You move with nearly unmatched grace and speed. When a creature other than you ends it's turn you can use your reaction to do one of the following:

items: {@bold Deployment.} You spend 1 ki point to use 2 ninja tools.
{@bold Attack.} You spend 1 ki point to make a melee weapon attack.
{@bold Sneak Attack.} You spend 2 ki points to teleport beind a target and attack them, you have advantage unless the target has true sight.
